components.name: ai-button
components.title: AIButton
components.description: A smart, provider-aware button component that instantly opens prompts in AI tools like ChatGPT or Perplexity. Fully themeable, variant-based, and designed for seamless integration into Astro projects without JavaScript by default. Perfect for enhancing UX with AI actions directly from your UI.

components.name: animate-scroll
components.title: AnimateScroll
components.description: A lightweight scroll-triggered animation wrapper that automatically animates each of its direct children as they enter or leave the viewport. Supports nested usage for granular control and configurable visibility thresholds

components.name: avatar
components.title: Avatar
components.description: A flexible avatar component that supports both static and dynamic images, with automatic optimization for local assets and seamless rendering for API-loaded content. Includes multiple size variants and two rendering modes for maximum compatibility.

components.name: badge
components.title: Badge
components.description: A lightweight, versatile badge component that provides clear labeling, supports multiple variants, and integrates seamlessly with icons or interactive UI elements.

components.name: button
components.title: Button
components.description: A customizable button component offering variant-based styling, size options, and support for rendering as different HTML blocks while preserving all native attributes.

components.name: card
components.title: Card
components.description: A structured card component system with dedicated subcomponents for headers, content, and footers. Provides a clean, flexible layout for displaying grouped information, statistics, and UI sections.

components.name: checkbox
components.title: Checkbox
components.description: A flexible and accessible checkbox component that supports custom styles, seamless labeling, disabled states, and smooth integration within form interfaces. Designed to deliver consistent behavior, intuitive interaction, and compatibility with external labels, it adapts effortlessly to a wide range of UI layouts and use cases.

components.name: form-field
components.title: FormField
components.description: A lightweight, semantic wrapper for organizing related form inputs, combining accessible fieldsets with fully customizable visual titles for clean and well-structured forms.

components.name: input
components.title: Input
components.description: A flexible input component that supports all native HTML input attributes, offering a consistent style for text fields, file inputs, and fully customizable form blocks.

components.name: label
components.title: Label
components.description: A simple and accessible label component that pairs seamlessly with form inputs, providing clear semantics, consistent styling, and support for disabled states.

components.name: list
components.title: List
components.description: A flexible list component composed of ListItem, ListItemMarker, and ListItemContent, allowing fully customizable markers and multi-line content, optimized for Lucide icons.

components.name: navigation-menu
components.title: NavigationMenu
components.description: A responsive Mega Menu component using Tailwind CSS and the native <details> element, ideal for structuring complex, multi-column navigation with descriptions and direct links.

components.name: page-metadata
components.title: PageMetadata
components.description: An all-in-one metadata component that streamlines SEO tags, social preview images, favicon links, font preloading, and optional client-side routing—providing a structured, maintainable way to manage metadata across Astro projects.

components.name: pagination-controls
components.title: PaginationControls
components.description: A compact, Astro-native pagination system that syncs directly with Astro's routing and pagination APIs, offering modular controls, dynamic page indices, and zero client-side JavaScript. Ideal for clean, scalable multi-page navigation in Astro projects.

components.name: post-meta
components.title: PostMeta
components.description: A versatile metadata component designed for blog posts, documentation pages, and content-driven layouts

components.name: preview-link
components.title: PreviewLink
components.description: Components for creating interactive inline links that trigger a floating content panel (tooltip/popup) on hover, enriching the reading experience without interrupting the flow of the main text.

components.name: review-stars
components.title: ReviewStars
components.description: A detailed rating breakdown component that displays star tiers with percentage-based distribution, customizable color variants, and accessible semantics—ideal for product reviews, feedback summaries, and analytics dashboards.

components.name: scroll-area
components.title: ScrollArea
components.description: A scrollable container component that enables smooth vertical or horizontal scrolling for overflowing content, with full control over direction, layout, and custom styling.

components.name: separator
components.title: Separator
components.description: A decorative and functional separator component offering multiple visual styles and customizable widths, ideal for section dividers and content organization.

components.name: spinner
components.title: Spinner
components.description: A customizable loading spinner component that offers various animated icons, suitable for buttons, forms, and asynchronous UI states.

components.name: textarea
components.title: TextArea
components.description: A flexible input component that supports all native HTML input attributes, offering a consistent style for text fields, file inputs, and fully customizable form blocks.

components.name: theme-toggle
components.title: Theme Toggle
components.description: A flexible wrapper component for toggling between light and dark themes, fully customizable and designed to work seamlessly with the ThemeProvider.

components.name: toggle
components.title: Toggle
components.description: A lightweight, accessible toggle component for Astro, perfect for managing binary UI states like likes, bookmarks, and switches. Fully customizable with Tailwind CSS.

components.name: tooltip
components.title: Tooltip
components.description: A lightweight, direction-aware tooltip component designed for Astro projects. Fully themeable, compatible with custom orientations, and built to enhance UX with accessible, hover-based hints — all without requiring JavaScript by default.

components.name: select
components.title: Sooltip
components.description: A fully customizable select component for Astro projects, built with composable primitives and minimal JavaScript. Supports grouped options, icons, keyboard navigation, and accessible semantics by default. Designed to be flexible, themeable, and production-ready.

components.name: lite-yt
components.title: LiteYT
components.description: A lightweight YouTube embed component that loads video thumbnails initially and only loads the full YouTube player when clicked. This approach significantly improves page performance by deferring the loading of heavy YouTube iframes until user interaction. The component is fully accessible, supports keyboard navigation, and uses YouTube's privacy-enhanced nocookie domain.

components.name: bento-grid
components.title: BentoGrid
components.description: A responsive grid layout system for creating bento-style layouts with zero runtime JavaScript. Features flexible column and row spanning, responsive breakpoints, and customizable gaps. Perfect for building modern, dashboard-style interfaces.

components.name: formatted-date
components.title: FormattedDate
components.description: A versatile date formatting component that displays dates in various human-readable formats. Supports localization and customization options to fit different regional date styles. Ideal for enhancing user experience by presenting dates clearly and consistently across your Astro projects.

components.name: breadcrumb
components.title: Breadcrumb
components.description: A simple and accessible breadcrumb navigation component that helps users understand their location within a website's hierarchy. Supports customizable separators and responsive design for optimal usability across devices.
